headline: Trump Trade: Loss of $10B JEDI contract ‘watershed’ moment for Bezos
summary: Catch up on the top industries and stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Donald Trump with this daily recap compiled by The Fly: WATERSHED MOMENT: Sources detail how former Amazon (AMZN) CEO Jeff Bezos made peace with President Donald Trump, with many pointing to Amazon losing the $10B JEDI contract during Trump’s first term as a watershed moment, The Financial Times’ Anna Nicolaou, Stephen Morris, Rafe Uddin, and Alex Rog

headline: FedEx price target lowered to $310 from $337 at TD Cowen
summary: TD Cowen lowered the firm’s price target on FedEx (FDX) to $310 from $337 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm said FedEx missed consensus and lowered guidance amid uncertainty. Near-term volume/rate catalysts are unlikely but the company also did not indicate economic decline was impending. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try Now>> See today’s best-performing stocks on TipRanks >> Read More on FDX: FedEx downgraded,

headline: FedEx: Cheap, But Comes With Baggage
summary: FedEx shows potential with cost cuts and insider buying, but risks remain. See why FDX stock is a Hold due to weak demand and uncertainty around tariffs.
